Review Name: Classy product Review Description: Depending Upon requirements it is one of the best AC available at genuine price point. I ordered it for my home in Kolkata it proved to be a right decision. Though installation team tried to fool us by initially quoting 12k for installation but we got it installed for Rs. 2000/-. Otherwise I'm using Voltas AC since long time and their quality and service response has grown steadily. This AC in particular is Good For Cooling a room of Approximately upto 120 Sqft. ONE CAN DEFINITELY GO FOR IT.
